title: Prolonged oral intake of green tea polyphenols attenuates delirium-like behaviors in mice induced by anesthesia/surgery
content:
Publication date: 15 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 5

Author(s): Yao Xue, Yan-Na Zhang, Man Wang, Hui-Yuan Fu, Ying-Chao Mao, Min Hu, Mei-Tao Sun, Hong-Gang Guo, Lin Cao, Chen-Zhuo Feng
